CHAT.comment: Telling stories and looking at books.
This file is the second of a series of four (48a to 48d) for the same session.
Room next to the classroom where the children have their afternoon nap. A table and chairs are added for our sessions.

u.a: showing the book to Lucien who is under the table .
William has joined Lucien under the table .
Matteo has just joined William and Lucien under the table . All three boys are now crawling .
putting her hand on Matteo's mouth .
